body.name: Miabella 925 Sterling Silver or 18Kt Yellow Gold Over Silver Italian Hammered Cross Pendant Chain Necklace 18 Inch Made in Italy
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 7 mins
features: STYLISH AND INSPIRATIONAL - Show your spiritual side with this Italian artisan crafted sterling silver cross necklace featuring a polished hand-hammered cross that dangles from a delicate chain. Wear it as a symbol of your faith or as a cool fashion statement. This small and simple cross is the perfect size for easy everyday wear and looks great with both casual and dressy outfits. Wear alone or layered with other chains.

CHOICE OF 18K YELLOW GOLD PLATED OVER 925 STERLING SILVER OR STERLING SILVER - Crafted of pure 925 sterling silver to give your jewelry a brilliant shine. Sterling silver is hypoallergenic and nickel-free making this a great choice for those with very sensitive skin. Unlike cheap metals, sterling silver does not irritate your skin. Pendant with bale, 22mm(13/16”) long, 12mm (7/16”) wide. Cable link chain 18 inches long. Spring ring clasp closure.

MADE IN ITALY - Italian jewelry is much more than a fashionable and elegant choice. Its rich history formed a people who strongly value creativity and passion. With a high demand for luxury Italian jewelry, early artisans paved the way for the superior design and quality craftsmanship still used today. High quality standards for fine jewelry in Italy are unmatched by any other country in the world making this a solid investment. Miabella jewelry is authenticated with a 925 ITALY trademark.

PERFECT GIFT FOR HER - This classic cross necklace is dainty enough for daily wear. It makes a sentimental gift for mom, daughter, son, wife, best friend or for you. Surprise someone special to a timeless and unique necklace with personal style. VISIT OUR STORE: For a full selection of sterling silver necklaces, bracelets, rings, hoops, stud earrings and authentic coin jewelry.

GIFT BOX INCLUDED - Miabella jewelry is shipped in an elegant gift box, ready to treat yourself or a loved one for any anniversary, birthday, wedding, confirmation, graduation, Christmas, Valentine’s Day, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day and any other holiday or special occasion gifting. From cool modern to classic vintage, Miabella offers high quality affordable sterling silver jewelry for women and men, comfortable for everyday wear and for all occasions. 30-day money-back guarantee.
body.description: Stylish 925 sterling silver hammered cross pendant necklace is crafted by skilled Italian artisans featuring a hammered design basic cross pendant on an 18 inch cable chain. Handmade in Italy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely beautiful but very delicate. Small. Looks beautiful on my wife...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well crafted and hangs beautifully.exactly as described and made in Italy. So happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this cross necklace. Not to small or big- its just right. The detail is adorable and I wear it everyday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I never take it off.
reviews.reviewText: This is a very good necklace! I have a sensitivity to a lot of metals but this necklace is 925 without a doubt. I also have very long hair and I was worried it would get caught. I never take this necklace off and my hair has never gotten caught in it. I also have young children that pull on my jewelry and this has withstood their tugs. Very durable and lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to purchase but I’m so glad I did. Super shiny sterling silver. Classy and perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got this crucifix and chain on April 13, 2023 put it on and never took it off. It’s still going strong under hot and muggy daily living conditions: sweat, pool, sunscreen, showers, etc. still shiny as the first day! Both are .925 silver and the cross is hammered on both sides and is not hollow, is a solid small and dainty looking cross.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was hard finding a cross necklace that wasn’t too flashy but also not boring but then I stumbled across this one! I have to say I was a little disappointed that it was so small and the chains short, however I’m in love with it now.Also, I work with small children at my second job and there’s been several instances, so far, of them pulling on the chain and it hasn’t broken. Heck, I even pulled on it accidentally ‘cause it was tangled in my hair and that didn’t break the chain either.Maybe it’s because I’ve only had it for a short period of time, but I’m not experiencing any of the negatives that other reviews seem to have.
Beautifully made. I am very happy with this purchase
J’adore cette croix d’une grosseur parfaite bi trop petite ! Update : deux jours plus tard le fini argent 925 s’écaille ! Très déçue je vais la renvoyer

I ordered this and it was not what it seemed. The chain was so thin and felt like it would snap so easily. The pendent was cute but also small. To me it seemed like it was more more a child not an adult. Returning it was a massive pain! I had to pay for shipping which from Canada to the US - it cost more than what the necklace was even worth. So by the time I paid for the necklace and the shipping to return it… I could have gotten two.
